data.text: @EggErin @bhrenton it's like the Nanodrop and a poorly written lab report had a baby
@bhrenton There's a bit more if you go to the link, but it's unfortunately lacking in update speed and transparency...
@G_Pask Is that all that’s there these days? I’m confused as to what I’m supposed to be looking at.
@EggErin @G_Pask @bhrenton Yes, a case where both form and content are deeply troubling!
@G_Pask @bhrenton It appears to be more of a random number generator now. The numbers never sum properly.
